name: Cube Destroyer (itch)
description:
Cube Destroyer is a hardcore top-down shooter with a dynamic gameplay.
Dodge bullets and destroy enemies.
Factories at the different levels are continuously producing enemies.
You must destroy the factories before the enemies surround you.

Features:

  • 75 levels
  • Dynamic gameplay
  • Minimalist graphics

Music in the trailer: La la triroriro by Rolemusic is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution License.
This music has been modified by the author of this trailer. http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/~/La_la_triroriro_1770
